roleset.name: making local, assigning to a specific place
roleset.note: Expanded by Julia based on BOLT, localize-v.01. No VNcls.

example.name: Both args
example.text: These authors point out that neuro-ophthalmology textbooks are inconsistent in their localization of Claude's syndrome.

example.name: EXT
example.text: All of the SNP 's gripes can be solved by greater localisation - not by a pointless break up .
